channel.title: Home on W. Joel Schneider
channel.description: Recent content in Home on W. Joel Schneider

item.title: Individual Psychometrics
item.description: A free online book about psychometric tools for psychological assessment. A work in progress.

item.title: Making text labels the same size as axis labels in ggplot2
item.description: The geom_text and geom_label functions do not specifiy text size the same way as the rest of ggplot2 elements do. For consistent text sizes, we can apply a simple conversion.

item.title: Bar chart labels on smooth paths in ggplot2
item.description: Placing stacked bar chart labels on a smooth path makes them easier to compare.

item.title: Point labels perpendicular to a curve in ggplot2
item.description: How to place legible labels for points on a curve in ggplot2

item.title: Caption on same line as axis title in ggplot2
item.description: You can put the caption on the line as the x-axis title

item.title: Concatenating vectors unless a vector is empty
item.description: The paste and paste0 functions have a recycle0 argument that returns an empty vector when any part of the string is empty.

item.title: Essentials of Assessment Report Writing, 2nd Edition
item.description: A book about making reader-friendly assessment reports that instill hope and promote change.

item.title: Psychological Testing and Assessment, 10th Edition
item.description: An introduction to tests and measurements

item.title: ggnormalviolin
item.description: A ggplot2 extension package for creating normal violin plots

item.title: simstandard
item.description: R package for simulating data using standardized coefficients

item.title: Opensource
item.description: My GitHub Repositories

item.title: Vita
item.description: table td { vertical-align: top !important; } table { font-variant-numeric: tabular-nums; } .csl-entry { padding-left:35px; text-indent:-35px; } .csl-entry a i, .csl-entry a{ padding-left:0px; text-indent:0px; } p img { max-width:900px; } h1 {margin-top:20px; display:block} h2 {margin-top:15px} h3 {margin-top:10px} h4 {margin-top:5px} #curriculum-vitae h1 { font-size: 40pt } #education td {padding-top: 10px} #education tr:first-child td {padding-top: 0px} .smalldate{ font-size: 1rem } Curriculum Vitae W. Joel Schneider Temple University
